forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 71 overnight. Southwest wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
